Package io.smint.clapi.consumer.integration.core.factory.impl

Class SmintIoDownloadProviderImpl

java.lang.Object
io.smint.clapi.consumer.integration.core.factory.impl.SmintIoDownloadProviderImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISmintIoDownloadProvider
public class SmintIoDownloadProviderImpl extends Object implements ISmintIoDownloadProvider
Creates a downloader that will download binary data from Smint.io API to a file.

The downloader uses the OAuth 2 data from IAuthTokenStorage to authorize the download with Smint.io.

  • Method Details

    • createDownloaderForSmintIoUrl

      public Provider<File> createDownloaderForSmintIoUrl(URL downloadFileUrl, File targetFile)
      Description copied from interface: ISmintIoDownloadProvider
      Creates a new Smint.io API downloader, targeted at the specific download URL.

      The created downloader must return null in case either of the parameters are null. For any download error, an exception must be thrown.

      Specified by:
      createDownloaderForSmintIoUrl in interface ISmintIoDownloadProvider
      Parameters:
      downloadFileUrl - the download URL to use to download the binary data from.
      targetFile - the file to store the binary data to.
      Returns:
      a brand new downloder that will provide the downloaded file.
